Procs

proc checkRequirement[T: object](self: var Cliquet[T]; definition: Config): bool
Source   Edit   
proc config[T: object](self: var Cliquet[T]): T
Get the parsed configurations into a configuration object. Arguments, configurations and defaults, are merged in that order of priority. raises an InvalidValue error if an option of an argument or configuration is not valid for the field type. Source   Edit   
proc generateConfig[T: object](self: Cliquet[T]): string
Generate a default configuration file for the defined settings. Source   Edit   
proc generateHelp[T: object](self: Cliquet[T]): string
Generate a help message for the defined command line options. Source   Edit   
proc generateUsage[T: object](self: Cliquet[T]): string
Generate a usage message for the defined command line options. Source   Edit   
proc initCliquet[T: object](default: T = default(T)): Cliquet[T]
Initialize Cliquet, optionally with the default configurations. Source   Edit   
proc parseConfig[T: object](self: var Cliquet[T]; config: string)
Parse configurations from a string. The config string is a list of key=value pairs separated by newlines. The config parameter is usually the contents of a configuration file. Lines starting with # are ignored. Source   Edit   
proc parseOptions[T: object](self: var Cliquet[T]; args: seq[string]): seq[
    string]
Parse command line options, the result is the remaining arguments from the first non-option argument. raises an InvalidShortOptions error if the short options are ill-formed ex: -abc=def. Source   Edit   
proc unknownConfigs[T](self: var Cliquet[T]): seq[string]
Get the user's configurations that do not belong to the configuration object. Source   Edit   
proc unknownOptions[T](self: var Cliquet[T]): seq[string]
Get the user's arguments that are not listed as options in the configuration object. Source   Edit   
proc unmetRequirments[T](self: var Cliquet[T]): seq[string]
Get the user's arguments that are required but not provided. Source   Edit
